attributes.action: To Recognise all care workers as equal as they are working on the frontline to!
attributes.additional_details: Care workers have been categorised as unskilled. They are also there on the frontline giving continued care to our most vulnerable. Most of the care workers may have to live in for a number of weeks if there is lockdown. There is no government support for them!
attributes.background: Care workers have been categorised as unskilled. Give them the recognition as any other frontline worker currently in the Uk

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to recognise the role of care workers, but it's not clear exactly what you want the Government to do to achieve this.

We have published petitions calling on key workers to be given hazard pay, bonuses, or tax relief, as a result of the coronavirus outbreak, which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

We have also published petitions calling on the Government to ensure that employees and self-employed people are paid if they have to self-isolate, which you also might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

If you want the Government to take some other action, you could start a new petition stating in more detail what you want the Government to do.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
